attributes.action: Move Parliament into the Millenium Dome and convert Westminster Parliament buildings into flats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to have the seat of government moved into the Millenium Dome. Parliamentary buildings should be converted into flats, some of which should be given over to affordable housing. The proceeds of which should be returned to the public coffers.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
